product_name: KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Colorful LED Water Speaker with Dancing Fountain Light Show Sound for PC, MP3 Player, Laptops, Smartphone Black
explanation: The CO2e emissions for the KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Water Speaker were estimated based on the following assumptions: 1) The product weighs 1.11 pounds (0.5 kg), with materials likely consisting of 50% plastic (emission factor: 5 kg CO2e/kg), 30% electronics (emission factor: 30 kg CO2e/kg), and 20% other materials (emission factor: 2 kg CO2e/kg). 2) Manufacturing emissions were estimated at 5 kg CO2e, considering energy-intensive processes for electronics and assembly. 3) Transportation emissions were estimated at 2 kg CO2e, assuming shipping from China to the US by sea and road. 4) Use-phase emissions were minimal (0.5 kg CO2e) due to low power consumption. 5) End-of-life emissions were estimated at 0.5 kg CO2e, assuming partial recycling and landfill disposal. The total CO2e of 12.5 kg is a rough estimate given the lack of specific data on material composition and supply chain details.

product_name: Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 Eyefinity 6 Edition 2048 MB GDDR5 PCI-Express Video Card 5870PE52G
explanation: The CO2e emissions for the Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 graphics card were estimated based on the following assumptions: 1) The product weighs 2.16 pounds (0.98 kg), with materials typically consisting of 40% plastics (emission factor: 5 kg CO2e/kg), 30% metals (emission factor: 10 kg CO2e/kg), 20% electronic components (emission factor: 20 kg CO2e/kg), and 10% other materials (emission factor: 2 kg CO2e/kg). 2) Manufacturing emissions were estimated at 30 kg CO2e, based on average emissions for similar electronics. 3) Transportation emissions were estimated at 5 kg CO2e, assuming global shipping. 4) Use phase emissions were not included as they vary significantly based on usage patterns. The total CO2e was calculated by summing the emissions from materials, manufacturing, and transportation.

product_name: Case for iPad Pro 12.9 2022/2021/2020/2018, Blue Flowers Shockproof Protective Case for iPad Pro 12.9 6th/5th/4th/3rd Gen, [Auto Sleep/Wake] [with Pencil Holder] Adjustable Stand iPad Case Folio Cover
explanation: The CO2e emissions for this iPad case are estimated based on the following assumptions: 1) The case is primarily made of PU leather (polyurethane) and TPU (thermoplastic polyurethane), with a microfiber interior. PU leather has an emission factor of approximately 5.0 kg CO2e/kg, TPU around 3.0 kg CO2e/kg, and microfiber around 2.0 kg CO2e/kg. 2) The case weighs 1.19 pounds (0.54 kg), with an estimated material composition of 50% PU leather, 30% TPU, and 20% microfiber. 3) Manufacturing and transportation emissions are estimated at 0.5 kg CO2e, based on typical values for similar products. The total CO2e is calculated as (0.27 kg PU leather * 5.0) + (0.162 kg TPU * 3.0) + (0.108 kg microfiber * 2.0) + 0.5 kg (manufacturing/transport) = 2.5 kg CO2e.

product_name: Lenovo Thinkpad T440S 14" FHD Touchscreen Ultrabook Laptop Computer, Intel Core i5-4200U up to 2.6GHz, 8GB RAM, 240GB SSD, WiFi, Bluetooth, USB 3.0, Windows 10 Professional (Renewed)
explanation: The CO2e emissions for the Lenovo Thinkpad T440S were estimated based on typical life cycle stages (production, use, and end-of-life) for a renewed laptop. Production emissions (approx. 200 kg CO2e) include materials like aluminum, plastics, and electronics, with the SSD contributing less than an HDD. Use phase emissions (approx. 80 kg CO2e) assume 4 years of use at 3 hours/day and 20W power draw, with a global average electricity emission factor. End-of-life emissions (approx. 20 kg CO2e) account for recycling and disposal. The 'renewed' status reduces production impacts by reusing components, lowering the total compared to a new laptop (typically 400-500 kg CO2e).

product_name: Ceeyali Reusable Hook and Loop Fastening Cable Ties Cable Straps for Home Office Tablet PC TV Electronics Wires Organizer Management (15 Pack 8 inch + 15 Pack 12 inch)
explanation: The product is a set of reusable hook and loop fastening cable ties made primarily from fabric material (likely polyester or nylon, based on typical hook-and-loop products). The CO2e emissions were estimated as follows: 1) Material production: Assuming 3.2 oz (90.7g) of fabric material per pack, with polyester's emission factor of ~5.5 kg CO2e/kg, this contributes ~0.5 kg CO2e. 2) Manufacturing: Energy for weaving and hook/loop attachment adds ~0.1 kg CO2e. 3) Packaging: Minimal plastic (0.04 inches thick) and cardboard (7.2 x 5 inches) contribute ~0.05 kg CO2e. 4) Transportation: Assuming sea freight from Asia to the US for a lightweight item adds ~0.05 kg CO2e. The total was rounded to 0.45 kg CO2e, accounting for the reusable nature reducing per-use impact compared to disposable plastic ties. The lack of precise material composition and manufacturing location introduces uncertainty, but this aligns with typical LCA values for similar fabric-based organizational products.

product_name: HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece with One Pair Medium Earmolds for Speaker Mics
explanation: The CO2e emissions were estimated based on the product's material composition (primarily rubber for the earpiece and silicon for the earmolds) and manufacturing processes. The emission factors used were 2.5 kg CO2e/kg for rubber and 5 kg CO2e/kg for silicon, considering their production and processing. The product's small size (0.04 lbs or ~0.018 kg) and lightweight packaging (0.07 kg) contribute minimally to transportation emissions. The manufacturing location (China) and shipping distance were also factored in, assuming air freight emissions of 0.8 kg CO2e/kg for international transport. The use phase and end-of-life emissions were considered negligible due to the product's low energy consumption and non-recyclable materials.

product_name: ASUS VivoBook Thin and Light Laptop, 15.6" HD Display, Intel Core i3-1005G1 Processor, USB Type-C, Webcam, Wi-Fi, HDMI, Windows 11 Home, Gray (12GB RAM | 256GB SSD)
explanation: The CO2e emissions for this laptop are estimated based on typical life cycle stages (production, use, and end-of-life) and material composition. Production accounts for ~70% of emissions (210 kg CO2e), primarily from the extraction and processing of metals (aluminum, copper) and electronics (SSD, RAM, processor). The use phase (assuming 4 years at 3 hours/day) contributes ~25% (75 kg CO2e) due to electricity consumption (Intel i3 processor, 15.6" display). End-of-life (recycling/disposal) adds ~5% (15 kg CO2e). The 256GB SSD and 12GB RAM increase emissions slightly compared to lower-spec models. Emissions factors are derived from industry averages for similar laptops.

product_name: SMDV Diffuser-50 -- Professional 20x20" Rigid Softbox for Canon Flash
explanation: The CO2e emissions were calculated based on the product's material composition and typical emission factors. The softbox is primarily made of rip-stop nylon (estimated 60% of weight) and fiberglass (estimated 30% of weight), with small metal components (10% of weight) for the speed ring and 'L' bracket. Emission factors used: nylon production (5.5 kg CO2e/kg), fiberglass production (2.5 kg CO2e/kg), and metal production (8 kg CO2e/kg). The total weight of 2.65 pounds (1.2 kg) was distributed as 0.72 kg nylon, 0.36 kg fiberglass, and 0.12 kg metal. Transportation and manufacturing energy were estimated to add 10% to the material emissions. End-of-life emissions were not included due to lack of disposal data.

product_name: RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit with 32GB Micro SD Card, Power Supply with ON/Off, Case, Micro SDHC Card, Cooling Fan, HDMI Cable, Network Cable, Hestsinks, Card Reader, Screwdriver
explanation: The CO2e emissions for the RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit were calculated by considering the emissions from material production, manufacturing, and transportation. The main components include the Raspberry Pi board (primarily made of silicon, plastic, and metals), a 32GB micro SD card (plastic and silicon), a power supply (plastic and metals), a case (plastic), a cooling fan (plastic and metals), and cables (plastic and metals). Emission factors were applied based on the weight and material composition of each component. The Raspberry Pi board contributes approximately 4 kg CO2e due to its electronic components and manufacturing process. The micro SD card adds about 1 kg CO2e, the power supply 2 kg CO2e, the case 0.5 kg CO2e, the cooling fan 0.5 kg CO2e, and the cables 0.5 kg CO2e. Transportation emissions were estimated at 4 kg CO2e, assuming air freight from manufacturing sites to distribution centers. The total CO2e emissions are the sum of these contributions.

product_name: USB 3.0 Extension Cable 20Ft, TanGuYu USB 3.0 Extender Cord Type A Male to A Female for Oculus VR, Playstation, Xbox, USB Flash Drive, Card Reader, Hard Drive,Keyboard, Printer, Scanner, Camera
explanation: The CO2e emissions for the USB 3.0 extension cable were calculated based on the following assumptions: 1) The cable is primarily made of PVC (70%) and copper (30%), with emission factors of 2.5 kg CO2e/kg for PVC and 4 kg CO2e/kg for copper. 2) The cable weighs 7 ounces (0.198 kg), leading to a material-based emission of 0.198 kg * (0.7*2.5 + 0.3*4) = 0.69 kg CO2e. 3) Manufacturing emissions (assembly, shielding, etc.) were estimated at 0.3 kg CO2e. 4) Transportation (assuming sea freight from China to the US) adds 0.2 kg CO2e. 5) End-of-life disposal (landfill) contributes 0.01 kg CO2e. The total is rounded to 1.2 kg CO2e, with the majority from materials and manufacturing.
